name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (ClouseDev)
description:
I haven't really put anything out in a long time, so I decided to jump back into Unity and dust off my C# skills. This is my first experiment, make a simple game and put it out there. I'll keep doing little things like this, getting my skills back up, and release them for free. Thanks for lookin'!

-Clouse
